name: Commuter Advertising
tag_list: bus-advertising, advertising, dayton-advertising, advertising-agency, advertising-firm, public-transportation, public-transit, public-transportation-advertising, public-transit-advertising, outside-advertising
overview:
Commuter Advertising is a premier provider of location-based digital transit media. CA’s dynamic media campaigns provide businesses the opportunity to advertise strategic messages to hyper-targeted audiences onboard public transit vehicles.

Commuter Advertising partners with transit authorities across the country to manage media sales and operations, increasing revenue for transit authorities and possibly alleviating the need for increased fare prices or community tax rates. This relationship benefits advertisers, transit authorities and commuters alike.

Commuter Advertising’s media portfolio includes:

TIME AND LOCATION-BASED AUDIO MESSAGING utilizes geo-targeted technology to trigger onboard announcements at scheduled times and selected locations. Messages are complemented with text scroll on transit vehicle marquees.

ONBOARD VIDEO MESSAGING captivates riders with 15-second commercials at select times and locations onboard transit vehicles.

BUS SIGNAGE displays visual messages on the sides of buses, making any ad a mobile billboard.

IN-STATION AUDIO plays inside busy transit stations while riders wait for transfers.

TEXT MESSAGING CAMPAIGNS enhance audio, video and print campaigns, extending the customer relationship and providing valuable methods of contact through opt-in messaging.

NAMING RIGHTS highlight advertisers’ brands through bold exposure at stations and on transit literature.

WEBSITE ADVERTISING reaches tech-savvy riders who visit transit web pages for rider information.

Media offerings vary per market. Commuter Advertising is headquartered in Dayton, Ohio, and operates in: Chicago and Champaign, IL; Cincinnati, Dayton and Toledo, OH; Kansas City, MO; Jacksonville, FL; Pittsburgh, PA; and Rockland County, NY. For more information, visit www.commuter-advertising.com.
